description:
Implementierung der grundlegenden Jahres- und Kontoübersicht
(nicht vollständig gedebugged)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  tbl_account.name AS Konto,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}01 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Januar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}02 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Februar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}03 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `März`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}04 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `April`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}05 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Mai`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}06 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Juni`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}07 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Juli`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}08 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `August`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}09 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `September`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}10 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Oktober`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}11 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `November`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}12 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Dezember`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) <= ${yearAct}12 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Jahresbilanz`
FROM view_balances
  RIGHT JOIN tbl_account ON view_balances.accountID = tbl_account.id
  WHERE YEAR(tbl_account.dateStart) <= ${yearAct} AND (YEAR(tbl_account.dateEnd) >= ${yearAct} OR ISNULL(tbl_account.dateEnd)) AND tbl_account.type IN( 1 )
  GROUP BY Konto
  ORDER BY Konto ASC

SELECT
  tbl_account.name AS Konto,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}01 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Januar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}02 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Februar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}03 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `März`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}04 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `April`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}05 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Mai`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}06 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Juni`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}07 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Juli`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}08 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `August`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}09 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `September`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}10 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Oktober`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}11 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `November`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct}12 THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Dezember`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(view_balances.dateValue) = ${yearAct} THEN view_balances.amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Jahresbilanz`
FROM view_balances
  RIGHT JOIN tbl_account ON view_balances.accountID = tbl_account.id
  WHERE YEAR(tbl_account.dateStart) <= ${yearAct} AND (YEAR(tbl_account.dateEnd) >= ${yearAct} OR ISNULL(tbl_account.dateEnd)) AND tbl_account.type IN( 1 )
  GROUP BY Konto
  ORDER BY Konto ASC

WITH
  loc_share AS (
    SELECT
      tbl_share.id AS shareId,
      tbl_share.name AS shareName,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <  ${yearAct}01 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Januar`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}01 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Februar`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}02 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `März`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}03 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `April`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}04 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Mai`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}05 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Juni`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}06 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Juli`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}07 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `August`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}08 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `September`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}09 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Oktober`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}10 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `November`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}11 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Dezember`,
      SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) <= ${yearAct}12 THEN tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume ELSE 0 END) AS `Jahresabschluss`
    FROM tbl_shareTransaction
      RIGHT JOIN tbl_share ON tbl_shareTransaction.share = tbl_share.id
    GROUP BY shareId
    ORDER BY shareId ASC),
  loc_shareHistory AS (
    SELECT
      tbl_shareHistory.share AS shareId,
      tbl_share.name AS shareName,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}12 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}12 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Januar`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}01 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}01 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Februar`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}02 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}02 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `März`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}03 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}03 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `April`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}04 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}04 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Mai`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}05 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}05 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Juni`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}06 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}06 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Juli`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}07 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}07 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `August`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}08 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}08 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `September`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}09 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}09 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Oktober`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}10 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}10 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `November`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}11 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}11 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Dezember`,
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM NOW()) > ${yearAct}12 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM tbl_shareHistory.date) = ${yearAct}12 THEN tbl_shareHistory.amount ELSE 0 END) ELSE dateMax.price END AS `Jahresabschluss`
    FROM tbl_shareHistory
      RIGHT JOIN tbl_share ON tbl_shareHistory.share = tbl_share.id
      INNER JOIN (SELECT
        tbl_shareHistory.share AS shareId,
        tbl_shareHistory.amount AS price,
        MAX(tbl_shareHistory.date) AS date
        FROM tbl_shareHistory
        GROUP BY shareId) AS dateMax ON tbl_shareHistory.Share = dateMax.shareId
        GROUP BY shareId
        ORDER BY shareId ASC),
  loc_dividend AS(
    SELECT
      tbl_share.id AS shareId,
      tbl_share.name AS shareName,
      SUM(tbl_accountingEntry.amount) AS amount
    FROM tbl_shareTransaction
      LEFT JOIN tbl_share ON tbl_shareTransaction.share = tbl_share.id
      LEFT JOIN tbl_accountingEntry ON tbl_shareTransaction.accountingEntry = tbl_accountingEntry.id
    WHERE YEAR(tbl_shareTransaction.dateTransaction) = ${yearAct} AND tbl_shareTransaction.tradingVolume = 0
    GROUP BY shareId
    ORDER BY shareId ASC)
            
SELECT
  tbl_share.name AS Wertpapier,
  loc_share.Januar * loc_shareHistory.Januar AS `Januar`,
  loc_share.Februar * loc_shareHistory.Februar AS `Februar`,
  loc_share.März * loc_shareHistory.März AS `März`,
  loc_share.April * loc_shareHistory.April AS `April`,
  loc_share.Mai * loc_shareHistory.Mai AS `Mai`,
  loc_share.Juni * loc_shareHistory.Juni AS `Juni`,
  loc_share.Juli * loc_shareHistory.Juli AS `Juli`,
  loc_share.August * loc_shareHistory.August AS `August`,
  loc_share.September * loc_shareHistory.September AS `September`,
  loc_share.Oktober * loc_shareHistory.Oktober AS `Oktober`,
  loc_share.November * loc_shareHistory.November AS `November`,
  loc_share.Dezember * loc_shareHistory.Dezember AS `Dezember`,
  loc_share.Jahresabschluss * loc_shareHistory.Jahresabschluss AS `Jahresabschluss`,
CASE WHEN NOT ISNULL(loc_dividend.amount) THEN loc_dividend.amount ELSE 0 END AS `Dividende`
FROM tbl_share
  LEFT JOIN loc_share ON tbl_share.id = loc_share.shareId
  LEFT JOIN loc_shareHistory ON tbl_share.id = loc_shareHistory.shareId
  LEFT JOIN loc_dividend ON tbl_share.id = loc_dividend.shareId
WHERE (loc_share.Januar + loc_share.Februar + loc_share.März + loc_share.April + loc_share.Mai + loc_share.Juni + loc_share.Juli + loc_share.August + loc_share.September + loc_share.Oktober + loc_share.November + loc_share.Dezember + loc_share.Jahresabschluss) > 0
GROUP BY Wertpapier
ORDER BY Wertpapier ASC

WITH
  loc_monthlyBalance AS (
    SELECT
      SUM(tbl_accountingEntry.amount) AS amountSum,
      tbl_accountingEntry.category AS categoryID,
      tbl_transaction.account AS accountID,
      tbl_transaction.dateValue AS dateValue
    FROM tbl_accountingEntry
      LEFT JOIN tbl_transaction ON tbl_accountingEntry.transaction = tbl_transaction.id
      INNER JOIN tbl_loan ON tbl_transaction.account = tbl_loan.account
      LEFT JOIN tbl_account ON tbl_transaction.account = tbl_account.id
      LEFT JOIN tbl_loanSumExclude ON tbl_loan.id = tbl_loanSumExclude.loanId AND tbl_loanSumExclude.category = tbl_accountingEntry.category
    WHERE tbl_loanSumExclude.id IS NULL
    GROUP BY categoryID, accountID, YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue), MONTH(tbl_transaction.dateValue)
    ORDER BY accountID ASC, dateValue DESC),
    loc_monthlyIntrest AS (
      SELECT
        SUM(tbl_accountingEntry.amount) AS amountSum,
        tbl_accountingEntry.category AS categoryID,
        tbl_transaction.account AS accountID,
        tbl_transaction.dateValue AS dateValue
      FROM tbl_accountingEntry
        LEFT JOIN tbl_transaction ON tbl_accountingEntry.transaction = tbl_transaction.id
        INNER JOIN tbl_loan ON tbl_transaction.account = tbl_loan.account
        LEFT JOIN tbl_account ON tbl_transaction.account = tbl_account.id
        LEFT JOIN tbl_loan loan2 ON tbl_account.id = loan2.account AND loan2.categoryIntrest = tbl_accountingEntry.category
      WHERE loan2.categoryIntrest IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) = ${yearAct}
      GROUP BY categoryID, accountID, YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue)
      ORDER BY accountID ASC, dateValue DESC)
SELECT
  tbl_account.name AS Darlehen,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}01 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Januar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}02 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Februar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}03 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `März`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}04 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `April`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}05 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Mai`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}06 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Juni`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}07 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Juli`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}08 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `August`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}09 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `September`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}10 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Oktober`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}11 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `November`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <  ${yearAct}12 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Dezember`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR_MONTH FROM loc_monthlyBalance.dateValue) <= ${yearAct}12 THEN loc_monthlyBalance.amountSum ELSE 0 END) + tbl_account.startAmount AS `Jahresabschluss`,
  CASE WHEN loc_monthlyIntrest.dateValue IS NOT NULL THEN SIGN(tbl_loan.intrestRate)*ABS(loc_monthlyIntrest.amountSum) ELSE 0 END AS `Zinsen`
FROM tbl_loan, ((tbl_account
  LEFT JOIN loc_monthlyBalance ON tbl_account.id = loc_monthlyBalance.accountID)
  LEFT JOIN loc_monthlyIntrest ON loc_monthlyIntrest.accountID = loc_monthlyBalance.accountID)
WHERE (YEAR(loc_monthlyIntrest.dateValue) = ${yearAct} OR YEAR(loc_monthlyIntrest.dateValue) IS NULL) AND
  YEAR(tbl_account.dateStart) <= ${yearAct} AND
  (YEAR(tbl_account.dateEnd) >= ${yearAct} OR ISNULL(tbl_account.dateEnd)) AND
  tbl_account.id IN(tbl_loan.account)
GROUP BY Darlehen
ORDER BY Darlehen ASC

SELECT
  view_categoryFullname.fullname AS `Kategorie`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 1 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Januar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 2 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Februar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 3 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `März`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 4 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `April`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 5 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Mai`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 6 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Juni`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 7 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Juli`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 8 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `August`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 9 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `September`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 10 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Oktober`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 11 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `November`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 12 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Dezember`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = ${yearAct} THEN amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Gesamt`
FROM `view_balances`
  LEFT JOIN tbl_account ON tbl_account.id = view_balances.accountID
  LEFT JOIN view_categoryFullname ON view_categoryFullname.id = view_balances.categoryID
WHERE year(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = ${yearAct} AND tbl_account.name = '${accountAct}' AND amountSum>=0
GROUP BY view_categoryFullname.fullname
ORDER BY view_categoryFullname.fullname ASC

SELECT
  view_categoryFullname.fullname AS `Kategorie`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 1 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Januar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 2 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Februar`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 3 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `März`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 4 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `April`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 5 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Mai`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 6 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Juni`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 7 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Juli`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 8 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `August`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 9 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `September`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 10 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Oktober`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 11 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `November`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = 12 THEN `view_balances`.`amountSum` ELSE 0 END) AS `Dezember`,
  SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = ${yearAct} THEN amountSum ELSE 0 END) AS `Gesamt`
FROM `view_balances`
  LEFT JOIN tbl_account ON tbl_account.id = view_balances.accountID
  LEFT JOIN view_categoryFullname ON view_categoryFullname.id = view_balances.categoryID
WHERE year(`view_balances`.`dateValue`) = ${yearAct} AND tbl_account.name = '${accountAct}' AND amountSum<0
GROUP BY view_categoryFullname.fullname
ORDER BY view_categoryFullname.fullname ASC

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) AS Year
          FROM tbl_transaction
          WHERE YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) <= (YEAR(curdate())+1)
          ORDER BY YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) DESC
list.description: This is the actual selected year
list.label: Jahr
list.name: yearAct
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) AS Year
          FROM tbl_transaction
          WHERE YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) <= (YEAR(curdate())+1)
          ORDER BY YEAR(tbl_transaction.dateValue) DESC

list.definition:
SELECT
name AS 'Name'
FROM `tbl_account`
LEFT JOIN tbl_accountType ON tbl_accountType.id = tbl_account.type
WHERE tbl_accountType.type = 'Girokonto'
ORDER BY name ASC
list.label: Konto
list.name: accountAct
list.query:
SELECT
name AS 'Name'
FROM `tbl_account`
LEFT JOIN tbl_accountType ON tbl_accountType.id = tbl_account.type
WHERE tbl_accountType.type = 'Girokonto'
ORDER BY name ASC

title: FiniA
